beginner.name: Beginner
beginner.description: Needs concrete, guided tasks; frequent support.
example_activities: Follow explicit instructions to create a basic blog post.
Identify safe online behaviours using a worksheet.
Fill in missing steps in a worked example.
beginner.guidance: Use high scaffolding, step-by-step instructions, focus on recognition/recall.

intermediate.name: Intermediate
intermediate.description: Can apply/modify ideas, work from frameworks.
example_activities: Improve a provided template for online collaboration.
Explain reasons for their chosen online communication approach.
Participate in a peer-feedback activity with a checklist.
intermediate.guidance: Offer frameworks, guiding questions, challenge with moderate independence.

advanced.name: Advanced
advanced.description: Works independently, creates solutions/projects, reflects critically.
example_activities: Design and manage a group online project from scratch.
Evaluate effectiveness of different online platforms for collaboration.
Draft a policy for responsible digital communication.
advanced.guidance: Set open-ended, project-based tasks; minimal scaffolding; expect self-evaluation and justification.
